```{r}
getwd()
```

```{r}
# load tidymodels package
library(tidymodels)

# handle package conflicts
tidymodels_prefer()

# load ames data
data(ames)
```

```{r}
# check data distribution

ames %>%
  ggplot() + 
  aes(x = Sale_Price) + 
  geom_histogram(bins = 50, col = "white")
```
data is right skewed

```{r}
# log transform data to stabilize the variance

ames %>%
  ggplot() + 
  aes(x = Sale_Price) + 
  geom_histogram(bins = 50, col = "white") +
  scale_x_log10()
```

```{r}
# log transform the data set
ames <- ames %>%
  mutate(Sale_Price = log10(Sale_Price))
```

```{r}
ames %>%
  ggplot() + 
  aes(x = Longitude, y = Latitude, color = Neighborhood) + 
  geom_point() + 
  coord_map() + 
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```
